name: baldrick-elm
description: Baldrick-elm is a Elm assistant with a cunning plan that can be used for scaffolding

scripts.doc: npx typedoc --json report/doc.json --pretty src/index.ts && npx baldrick-doc-ts typedoc --json-source report/doc.json && baldrick-doc-ts parse -f internal ngram && yarn md:fix
scripts.md: baldrick markdown check && baldrick markdown check -s .github/
scripts.md:fix: baldrick markdown fix && baldrick markdown fix -s .github/
scripts.ready: yarn lint && yarn test:cov && yarn md && yarn outdated && yarn audit && yarn release:check
scripts.norm: npx baldrick-ts generate -f cli no:test -ga 'flarebyte' -ch 'Flarebyte.com' -cy 2022 -l MIT && yarn md:fix
scripts.norm:g: baldrick-ts generate -f cli no:test -ga 'flarebyte' -ch 'Flarebyte.com' -cy 2022 -l MIT && yarn md:fix
